metaData.title: New Kent Handyman - Your Licensed Neighborhood Handyman
metaData.description: Professional licensed handyman services in New Kent, Henrico, and Hanover. Detailed construction and installations. Routine Maintenance. Emergency Repairs. Trust our licensed professionals to handle your home projects efficiently. Free consultations available!

benefits.title: Save Time
benefits.description: With busy schedules, you don't have time for home repairs. Let a professional handle them.

benefits.title: Cost-Effective
benefits.description: Get services like ceiling fan installation, power washing, and light fixture replacement at a fraction of the cost.

benefits.title: Quality Workmanship
benefits.description: Experienced in a wide range of home maintenance tasks.

benefits.title: Convenience
benefits.description: From fixing leaky faucets to cleaning patios, one call does it all.
